name: Super Bike TransAm
overview: Take control of your Super Bike and race through 5 stages within the time limit to win. The stage themes in order are, Desert, City, Maze, Jumps and Arctic. Player controls bike speed (up to 200mph), direction and height, through the ability to jump. This is used to jump over canyons and other elements that block the road. The player must reach the stage markers within a time limit to continue. Time bonuses are awarded based on how well the player did.
